review: It works as described and provides access to services that stream their signal via Internet and your Wi-Fi directly to the Fire Stick device on your TV. Same as Roku. I found the remote very user-unfriendly and downloaded the app to my (Android) smartphone. This setup works well. The device offers access to streaming services that are also vailable via Roku, such as Netflix of Watch ESPN. - As an Amazon Prime member one is supposed to have access to tons of movies. Using Fire Stick I found that the access to free stuff appears to be limited and the Fire Stick device wants to lead one to PURCHASE videos.
author: alius
